EmailTemplate.name: Baltimore Reminder
EmailTemplate.subject: Reminder: vAuto Provisioning Workshop Tomorrow - Baltimore, MD - March 10, 2015
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
vAuto Provisioning Workshop Baltimore, MD Tuesday, March 10, 2015
This is a reminder that you are registered for the vAuto Provisioning Workshop in Baltimore, MD on Tuesday, March 10. If you have any questions or concerns, simply reply to this email.
Don't forget to bring your laptop or other device to access the vAuto Provision tool during the workshop!
Location: BWI Airport Marriott 1743 West Nursery Road Linthicum Heights, MD 21090 410-859-8300
Agenda Overview: 8:30am - Check-in and Continental Breakfast (provided by vAuto) 9:00am - Meeting Start 12:00pm - Meeting End
Note: To reserve a hotel room at the BWI Airport Marriott, you may book online here <http://www.marriott.com/hotels/travel/bwiap-bwi-airport-marriott/> or call the hotel directly at 410-859-8300. Don't forget to bring your laptop or other device to access the vAuto Provision tool during the workshop!
